VOX.V.summary: Vox Royalty Corp. operates as a precious metals focused mining royalty and streaming company. The company holds a portfolio of 50 royalties and streaming assets, as well as 1 royalty option. It operates in Australia, Canada, Peru, Brazil, Mexico, the United States, Madagascar, and Nigeria. Vox Royalty Corp. was founded in 2014 and is based in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.
